entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:32 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 2:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -18.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 46 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -27.7°C
Wind: WNW 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
